General.Name: Madusari Murni Indah Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Madusari Murni Indah Tbk, through its subsidiaries, produces and sells food grade ethanol. It also provides carbon dioxide gas in liquid and dry forms; and organic and potassium fertilizers. The company sells its products under the Molindo Ethanol, Molindo CO2, and Molindo Fertilizer brands. It serves food and beverage, pharmaceutical, cosmetic, cigarette, hospital, furniture, ink, printing, fuel, and welding industries. The company was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Malang, Indonesia. PT Madusari Murni Indah Tbk operates as a subsidiary of PT Cropsco Panen Indonusa.
General.Address: Jl. Sumber Waras No. 255, Malang, Indonesia, 65216
